problem.markdown:
1. WHAT AMONG THE NC OPERATIONS GIVEN BELOW IS CONTINUOUS PATH OPERATION ? ( ) Drilling ( ) Punching in Metal Sheet (x) Milling ( ) All of the above
2. A BLOCK OF INFORMATION IN NC PROGRAM MEANS ( ) One row on tape ( ) One complete program for a job (x) One complete Instruction ( ) One complete Statement
3. IN 3D MACHINING SURFACES ARE TO BE CUT LIE ON (x) Three plane ( ) Two plane ( ) One plane ( ) Two and Half plane
4. BALL ENF MILLING CUTTER IS PREFERRED IN 3D MACHINING INSTREAD OF SLOT DRILLS OR END MILLS FOR (x) 3D Finish machining ( ) 3D Rough machining ( ) Drilling ( ) All of the above
5. IN CNC MACHINE TOOL, ENCODER IS USED TO SENSE AND CONTROL ( ) Table velocity (x) Table Position ( ) Spindle Speed ( ) All Of the Above
problem.p: 1. WHAT AMONG THE NC OPERATIONS GIVEN BELOW IS CONTINUOUS PATH OPERATION ?
2. A BLOCK OF INFORMATION IN NC PROGRAM MEANS

choicegroup.choice: One complete program for a job

problem.p: 3. IN 3D MACHINING SURFACES ARE TO BE CUT LIE ON
4. BALL ENF MILLING CUTTER IS PREFERRED IN 3D MACHINING INSTREAD OF SLOT DRILLS OR END MILLS FOR
5. IN CNC MACHINE TOOL, ENCODER IS USED TO SENSE AND CONTROL
